problem.markdown:
A virtuous data cycle is made of: >>Select the one correct answer<<
(x) A. Data use and Data Quality ( ) B. Data Quality and Data Sets ( ) C. Data Sets and Data Elements ( ) D. Data Use and Data Sets
[explanation] A virtuous data cycle consists of data use and data quality. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: A virtuous data cycle is made of:
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer

choicegroup.choice: A. Data use and Data Quality
B. Data Quality and Data Sets

div.p: A virtuous data cycle consists of data use and data quality.
